title: Manage a Dock Appointment
description: A carrier calls to reschedule their delivery appointment for a later time.

tasks.description: Find the carrier's existing appointment using their PO number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the current appointment scheduled for 10 AM.
Agent successfully cancels the 10 AM appointment, freeing up the slot.

tasks.description: View the dock schedule and find a new available time slot for the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an open slot at 2 PM.

tasks.description: Book the new appointment for the carrier at 2 PM and send a confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reschedules the appointment and confirms with the carrier.
